Module kivakit.microservice

Package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet

package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    MicroservletRequest
    A microservlet request, with a specific response type given by MicroservletRequest.responseType().
    MicroservletRequestHandler
    Creates a MicroservletResponse when MicroservletRequestHandler.onRequest() is called.
    MicroservletResponse
    Interface for response implementations.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BaseMicroservletRequest
    Base class for all microservlet requests.
    BaseMicroservletResponse
    Base class for response implementations.
    Microservlet<Request extends MicroservletRequest,​Response extends MicroservletResponse>
    A microservlet responds to requests by implementing Microservlet.onRequest(MicroservletRequest).
    MicroservletError
    Describes an error.
    MicroservletErrorResponse
    A list of error messages used in MicroservletResponse for specific HTTP error codes.
    MicroservletRequestStatistics
    Statistics about a given request
    MicroservletRequestStatisticsAggregator
